Title: toRelativeDayNum
Description: Converts a date, or date with time, to the number of days elapsed since a certain fixed point in the past.
date — Date or date with time. Date/DateTime/DateTime64.
The number of days from a fixed reference point in the past. UInt32.
Examples: SELECT  toRelativeDayNum(toDate('1993-10-05')) AS d1,  toRelativeDayNum(toDate('2000-09-20')) AS d2
